mapper.update: update w_address set ad_province = #{adProvince,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ad_city = #{adCity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ad_district = #{adDistrict,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ad_site = #{adSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ad_name = #{adName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ad_tel = #{adTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ad_user_id = #{adUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ad_isdefault = #{adIsdefault,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ad_id = #{adId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ad_id, ad_province, ad_city, ad_district, ad_site, ad_name, ad_tel, ad_user_id, ad_isdefault from w_address where ad_id = #{adId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ad_id, ad_province, ad_city, ad_district, ad_site, ad_name, ad_tel, ad_user_id, ad_isdefault from w_address
